Name: ACR
Description:
Basic worker unit. Can gather resources, build Genetron structures, and repair.

Can attack ground units.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders SCV to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.
Root.Name: Gather

Root.Tooltip: Returns the carried resources to the nearest drop-off point.
Root.Name: Return Cargo

Root.Tooltip: Restores life to mechanical units at the cost of power.
Root.Name: Repair

Root.Tooltip: Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Root.Name: Halt

Root.Tooltip: Orders the unit to apply your currently selected spray to the terrain at the target location.
Root.Name: Spray

0002.Tooltip:
Primary structure. Used to receive gathered resources. Generates power. Increases power storage by 400. Can use Mining Priority and System Recharge

Enables:
- ACRs
0002.Name: Build Processing Core

0002.Tooltip: Built over a Vespene Geyser to allow harvesting of vespene gas.
0002.Name: Build Filtering Plant

0002.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
0002.Name: Cancel

0002.Tooltip:
Contains weapon upgrades for Genetron light ground units, and armor upgrades for all Genetron ground units.

Enables:
- Blitzers at the Manufacturer
- Moles at the Fabricator
- Repulsors from ACRs
- Interdictors from ACRs
0002.Name: Build Analysis Terminal

0002.Tooltip:
Anti-ground defensive structure. Can burrow, disabling its weapon, and rendering itself invisible to enemies.

Can attack ground units.
0002.Name: Build Repulsor

0002.Tooltip:
Anti-air defensive structure. Can burrow, disabling its weapon, and rendering itself invisible to enemies.

Can attack air units.
Detector
0002.Name: Build Interdictor

0002.Tooltip:
Increases power storage by 100. Can use System Recharge.

Enables:
- Processors at the Processing Core
0002.Name: Build Relay Tower

0003.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
0003.Name: Cancel

0003.Tooltip:
Produces heavy machines.

Enables:
- Torrents
- Moles
0003.Name: Build Fabricator

0003.Tooltip:
Contains weapon upgrades for Genetron heavy ground units, and weapon and armor upgrades for Genetron air units.

Enables:
- Inciters at the Fabricator
0003.Name: Build Tech Vault

0003.Tooltip:
Aircraft production facility.

Enables:
- Avengers
- Hornets
0003.Name: Build Assembly Array

0003.Tooltip: Generates power. Increases power storage by 50.
0003.Name: Build Generator

0003.Tooltip:
Tech structure.

Enables:
- Aquilas at the Manufacturer
- Teslas at the Fabricator
- Virtus at the Fabricator
0003.Name: Build Chemical Firm

0003.Tooltip:
Tech structure.

Enables:
- Jupiters at the Assembly Array
- Badgers at the Assembly Array
0003.Name: Build Ordnance Cache

0003.Tooltip:
Contains upgrades for the Spitfire.

Enables:
- Fixers at the Manufacturer
- Equalizers at the Manufacturer
0003.Name: Build Outfitting Station

0003.Tooltip: Weapon of mass destruction. Uses power to energize a global strike weapon that deals damage in a large area.
0003.Name: Build Olympus
